oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Exit/succession planning
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: McCormick, David
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: ownership
succession planning
sell
buy
buy-in
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Planning for your exit can make a significant difference as to how and when you exit as well as what your practice may be worth. Starting early helps make sure that you end up where you want to be instead of just an exit. This article contains checklists and information to help prepare for an exit from ownership.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; No. 55 (2022): 2022 Annual Conference Proceedings; 111-112
